result.execSummary:
The defendant Paul L. Plotkin was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
Court costs and DNA surcharge are to be paid as a Condition of Probation.

  If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.
AODA assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended by the agent.

Anger Management or Domestic Violence Counseling and follow through with any treatment deemed appropriate by the agent.
No contact with Matt Gamble.
No VIOLENT contact with defendant's wife.
ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
Submit to random urine screens.
No use or possession of alcohol, illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia.
No use or possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription.
Any valid prescription drugs must be taken only in the manner in which they are prescribed.
Inform Agent of any and all prescriptions.
Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent.
  Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided,   immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Paul L. Plotkin

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Lindsey Hirt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Paul L. Plotkin in court with attorney Bradley J. Bloch.

Defendant enters a plea of No Contest to count 1.
Court finds the defendant Guilty of count 1.
Repeater enhancer is struck.
Count 2 is dismissed as a read in.
Defendant presented statements to the court.


Court orders the following:
SENTENCE WITHHELD.

Term of Probation:  18 Months.
Concurrent to:  Case 16CF56
CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:  
Anger Management or D.V. Counseling and follow through with any treatment deemed appropriate by the agent.
AODA Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended by the agent.
Absolute Sobriety;  Random U.A.'s ; 
No Use or Possession of alcohol, controlled substances or drug paraphernalia.
No Use or Possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription;
Any valid prescription drugs must be taken only in the manner in which they are prescribed.
Inform Agent of all prescriptions
Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
No contact with:  Matt Gamble.
No Violent Contact with:  Defendant's Wife (Laurie).
DNA sample to be provided.

Costs:  $243
DNA Sample and Surcharge:  $200
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
To be paid as a Condition of Probation.
